fields.name: Log Cabin
fields.description: In this challenge, you are required to draw a small cabin out of unicode characters. You will be given two parameters width (odd number in range <5, 49 >) and height (number in range <5, 50 >). Based on these inputs you are required to draw a log cabin with a fence that will be width characters wide and height lines tall, the fence should always be 2 lines high with a supporting beam on each sides of the cabin. Valid characters are x | = , each line needs to be exactly width characters wide (use spaces) and should be terminated with \r\n. To make it a challenge, the goal is to build it as fast as possible.

fields.name: Piece of Cake
fields.description:
Using regex should be a piece of cake for any aspiring (RPA) developer. In this challenge, you will test your regex skills on a simple task.

You will be given 3 input parameters:
Text - randomly generated text paragraph,
Word - a work that is contained (at least once) in the text,
Brackets - one type of brackets "()" or "[]" or "{}".

You are required to answer the following:
Count - total number of occurrences of the given word in the given text,
First occurrence - index of the first occurrence of the word (starts with 0),
Count enclosed - count number of occurrences of the word that are enclosed in the given type of brackets.
